Package developpement

Class Board

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
developpement.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Board extends javafx.scene.layout.Region
The Board class represents the game board with everything on it : tiles, barriers and players. It also has methods to to change the visibility of every object, to move a player on the board, to place barriers and to check if a path to win exists for each player. An adjacency list is added as an attribute to the class in order to be used in the methods that search for a path.
Author:
Cardenas D, Ruellan B, Machnik A, Johnson A, Guenneau R
